Abridged conversation history: Provide a short summary of this project Based on the codebase, this is **hibrahimgunbulak.github.io** - a personal portfolio website and coding lab by Halil İbrahim Günbulak that hosts multiple web applications: ## Main Projects **1. MType Games** (`mtype/`, `mlanguage/`) - Z-Type inspired typing game for English vocabulary learning - CEFR A1-C2 levels with 3000+ words - 10-level difficulty system with dynamic speed scaling - Canvas-based graphics, Web Audio API sounds - Turkish/English localization **2. Klavye Çalış** (`klavyecalis/`) - Professional typing practice app for clerical exam preparation - 180-second typing sessions with detailed analysis - Mistake tracking and practice pool - Minimal white-themed design - WPM calculation and error rate analysis **3. HİG CodeLab** (`courses/`) - Educational platform with programming tutorials - Flutter, Python, Java, JavaScript examples - Interactive course materials and projects ## ️ Tech Stack - **Frontend**: Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5 Canvas, CSS3 - **Audio**: Web Audio API with fallback synthesis - **Storage**: LocalStorage for user data - **Security**: Copy-paste protection, obfuscation ready - **Design**: Responsive, cyberpunk/neon aesthetics The project demonstrates modern web development practices with modular architecture, comprehensive documentation, and production-ready security measures. Dosyamın içerisine bloglar diye bir yer dosya açmanı istiyorum ayrıca index sayfamda da önce bloglarımı otomatik öne çıkarabilicek bir sayfa istiyorum index.html main.css blogs/blog.css blogs/blog.js blogs/blogs.json blogs/README.md . script.js mkdir -p blogs open index.html OK. Şöyleki yeni bir blog eklerken ekran resimleri yazılar vs çok uğraştırıcı olucak her biri için bir index html yazmak istemiyorum bana öyle bir kod yazki sayfa yukardan aşağı akacak şekilde bunun içerisine bir js dosyası gömdüğümde yerli yerinde gözüksün örneğin { "blog1":{ "header" :"Deneme","images1":"images/images1.png","text1":"x",""alıntı":"deneme","small_header":"x2","text2":"y","images2":"images/images2.png" bunların yerleri değişebilir ve artabilir azalabilir sen olanlara göre bu sayfaların yeni sayfada görünmesini sağla blogs/blog.js blogs/blogs.json blogs/README.md blogs/blog-contents.json blogs/blog-detail.css blogs/blog-detail.html blogs/blog-detail.js blogs open index.html Harika! Şimdi size oluşturduğum blog sistemini özetleyeyim: ## Blog Sistemi Başarıyla Oluşturuldu! ### Oluşturulan Dosyalar: 1. **`blogs/blogs.json`** - Ana sayfada gösterilecek blog kartları 2. **`blogs/blog-contents.json`** - Detaylı blog içerikleri (esnek yapı) 3. **`blogs/blog.css`** - Ana sayfa blog stilleri 4. **`blogs/blog.js`** - Ana sayfa blog yükleme kodları 5. **`blogs/blog-detail.html`** - Blog detay sayfası şablonu 6. **`blogs/blog-detail.css`** - Detay sayfası stilleri 7. **`blogs/blog-detail.js`** - Dinamik içerik yükleme sistemi 8. **`blogs/README.md`** - Detaylı kullanım kılavuzu ### ✨ Özellikler: #### Ana Sayfa (index.html): - ✅ "Blogs" menü öğesi eklendi - ✅ Bloglar bölümü "About" sonrası eklendi - ✅ Carousel ile blog kartları gösterimi - ✅ Tıklanabilir kartlar (detay sayfasına yönlendirme) #### Blog Detay Sayfası: - ✅ **Tamamen dinamik içerik sistemi** - ✅ URL parametresi ile blog yükleme (`?id=blog1`) - ✅ Esnek içerik blokları: - `text` - Paragraf ...": "2024-01-20", "author": "Halil İbrahim GÜNBULAK", "readTime": "5", "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"], "content": [ { "text": "Giriş..." }, { "header": "Bölüm 1" }, { "image": "images/resim.jpg" }, { "text": "Açıklama..." }, { "quote": "Alıntı" }, { "list": ["Madde 1", "Madde 2"] } ] } ``` ### Avantajlar: 1. **Tek şablon, sonsuz blog** - Her blog için ayrı HTML yazmaya gerek yok 2. **Esnek yapı** - İstediğiniz sırada, istediğiniz kadar içerik bloğu 3. **Kolay yönetim** - Sadece JSON dosyasını düzenle 4. **SEO dostu** - Her blog ayrı URL'ye sahip 5. **Responsive** - Mobil ve masaüstünde mükemmel görünüm 6. **Hızlı** - Dinamik yükleme ile performanslı ### Örnek Kullanım: Sistemi test etmek için ana sayfada "Blogs" bölümüne gidin ve herhangi bir blog kartına tıklayın. Blog detay sayfası açılacak ve içerik yukarıdan aşağıya akacak şekilde gösterilecek! Tüm detaylar için `blogs/README.md` dosyasına bakabilirsiniz. MY BLOGS kismi Yaklaşık 30 - 40 blog olucak o yüzden burayı biraz daha kullanışlı hale getirmek lazım 4 Satır 2 kolon yapalım sağa doğru gittikçe diğerlerini görebilsin blogs/blog.css blogs/blog.js blogs/blogs-data.js blogs/README.md index.html open http://localhost:8000 Summary was generated by Agent(you) so 'I' in the summary represents Agent(you). Here is the summary: ## Context: Blog System Grid Layout Conversion ### 1. Previous Conversation: The conversation focused on converting a blog system from a carousel-based layout to a grid-based layout with horizontal scrolling functionality. The user's website (hibrahimgunbulak.github.io) has a blog section that was previously using an Owl Carousel component, but needed to be updated to use a custom grid system that displays blogs in a 4-row x 2-column format with horizontal scrolling navigation. ### 2. Current Work: I was tasked with converting the blog display system from a carousel to a grid layout. The work involved: - Updating the CSS to implement a 4-row x 2-column grid layout using CSS Grid - Modifying the HTML structure to replace carousel containers with grid containers - Adding horizontal scroll functionality with navigation buttons - Implementing scroll button state management (enable/disable based on scroll position) - Adding responsive design breakpoints for mobile and tablet views - Creating additional test blog entries to demonstrate the grid scrolling functionality The conversion was completed successfully with all files updated and a local server running for testing. ### 3. Key Technical Concepts: - CSS Grid Layout (grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, grid-auto-flow) - Horizontal scrolling with smooth behavior - JavaScript scroll event handling and button state management - Responsive design with media queries - jQuery DOM manipulation - LocalStorage for blog data management - Modular JavaScript architecture - Blog content management system with structured data ### 4. Relevant Files and Code: - **blogs/blog.css** - Converted from carousel styles to grid layout styles - Added horizontal scrolling container with custom scrollbar - Implemented 4-row x 2-column grid: `grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); grid-template-rows: repeat(4, auto);` - Added scroll navigation button styles - Updated responsive breakpoints for mobile/tablet - **index.html** - Replaced carousel HTML structure with grid structure: ```html
Kaydırmak için okları kullanın
``` - **blogs/blog.js** - Updated `displayBlogs()` function to target grid instead of carousel - Added scroll functions: `scrollBlogsLeft()`, `scrollBlogsRight()`, `updateScrollButtons()` - Implemented scroll event listener for button state management - Added smooth scrolling behavior with 80% viewport width scroll amount - **blogs/blogs-data.js** - Extended with additional test blog entries (12 total blogs) - Maintained existing blog structure with id, blogId, title, description, date, image, tags - **blogs/README.md** - Updated feature list to reflect grid layout capabilities - Added documentation for horizontal scrolling and navigation features ### 5. Problem Solving: Successfully resolved the conversion from carousel to grid layout by: - Removing Owl Carousel dependencies and replacing with custom CSS Grid - Implementing smooth horizontal scrolling with JavaScript - Adding proper button state management to prevent scrolling beyond boundaries - Ensuring responsive design works across all device sizes - Maintaining existing blog data structure and loading mechanisms ### 6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps: The blog grid conversion has been completed successfully. The system now features: - A 4-row x 2-column grid layout that displays 8 blogs at once - Horizontal scrolling with smooth navigation - Responsive design that adapts to mobile (single column) and tablet views - Proper scroll button state management - All existing blog functionality preserved The local server is running on port 8000 and the updated blog system is ready for testing and use. No pending tasks remain for this conversion project. Continue the conversation and finish the task given by the user from this point. ","Ok. "str_replace", "path": "blogs/README.md", "instruction_reminder": "ALWAYS BREAK DOWN EDITS INTO SMALLER CHUNKS OF AT MOST 150 LINES EACH.", "old_str_1": "## \ud83d\udd27 \u00d6zelle\u015ftirme\n\n### Renkleri De\u011fi\u015ftirme\n`blogs/blog.css` ve `blogs/blog-detail.css` dosyalar\u0131nda `crimson` rengini de\u011fi\u015ftirerek tema rengini \u00f6zelle\u015ftirebilirsiniz.\n\n### Carousel Ayarlar\u0131\n`blogs/blog.js` dosyas\u0131ndaki `initializeBlogCarousel()` fonksiyonunda:\n- `autoplayTimeout`: Otomatik ge\u00e7i\u015f s\u00fcresi (ms)\n- `items`: G\u00f6sterilecek blog say\u0131s\u0131", "old_str_start_line_number_1": 138, "old_str_end_line_number_1": 146, "new_str_1": "## \ud83d\udd27 \u00d6zelle\u015ftirme\n\n### Renkleri De\u011fi\u015ftirme\n`blogs/blog.css` ve `blogs/blog-detail.css` dosyalar\u0131nda `crimson` rengini de\u011fi\u015ftirerek tema rengini \u00f6zelle\u015ftirebilirsiniz.\n\n### Grid D\u00fczeni De\u011fi\u015ftirme\n`blogs/blog.css` dosyas\u0131nda `.blogs-grid` s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fczenleyin:\n```css\n.blogs-grid {\n grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); /* Kolon say\u0131s\u0131 */\n grid-template-rows: repeat(4, auto); /* Sat\u0131r say\u0131s\u0131 */\n gap: 30px; /* Kartlar aras\u0131 bo\u015fluk */\n}\n```\n\n### Scroll H\u0131z\u0131 Ayarlama\n`blogs/blog.js` dosyas\u0131nda `scrollBlogsLeft()` ve `scrollBlogsRight()` fonksiyonlar\u0131nda:\n```javascript\nconst scrollAmount = container.clientWidth * 0.8; // 0.8 de\u011ferini de\u011fi\u015ftirin (0.5 - 1.0
